titleInfo.title: Quarkonium binding and dissociation: The spectral analysis of the QGP

mods.abstract: in statistical QCD, the thermal properties of the quark-gluon plasma can be determined by studying the in-medium behaviour of heavy quark bound states. The results can be applied to quarkonium production in high energy nuclear collisions, if these indeed form a fully equilibrated QGP. Modifications could arise if an initial charm excess persists in the collision evolution and caused quarkonium regeneration at hadronization.
